mapper.select: select t.ID id, t.USER_NAME userName, t.LOGIN_NAME loginName, t.PASSWORD password, t.ROLE_ID roleId, b.ROLE_NAME roleName, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate from t_sys_account t LEFT JOIN t_sys_role b ON t.ROLE_ID=b.ID where t.LOGIN_NAME=#{loginName} AND t.DELETE_FLAG='1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sys_account ( USER_NAME, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, ROLE_ID, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATA ) VALUE ( #{userName}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{roleId}, #{createUserId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_sys_account t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1'

SELECT t.ID id, t.USER_NAME userName, t.LOGIN_NAME loginName, t.PASSWORD password, t.ROLE_ID roleId, b.ROLE_NAME roleName, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_sys_account t LEFT JOIN t_sys_role b ON t.ROLE_ID=b.ID WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATA LIMIT #{rows} OFFSET #{page}
